speaker: Customer
text: Yes, this is Mark. How can I help you?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm calling from XYZ Collections about your outstanding balance. First, can you verify your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Alright, and can you confirm your current address?

speaker: Agent
text: Great, thanks. You have a balance of $750. What the hell are you going to do about it?

speaker: Customer
text: I would like to discuss payment options.

speaker: Agent
text: Payment options? Just pay it already, it’s not that hard!

speaker: Customer
text: I understand, but I need a few moments to arrange that.

speaker: Agent
text: Hurry the hell up then! This is a joke, right?

speaker: Customer
text: I assure you this is not a joke. I will make this payment soon.

speaker: Agent
text: Whatever, just don’t take too long or I’ll come after you!

speaker: Customer
text: Thank you for your time, I will handle this shortly.

speaker: Agent
text: Yeah, sure. Good luck with that!
